title: Kodi Muttai Curry (Andhra-style Chicken Egg Curry)
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add green chilies and ginger-garlic paste, cook until fragrant.
Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until soft.
Add chicken pieces and cook until tender.
Add garam masala and mix well.
Add the boiled eggs, gently mix and simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.

title: Egg Chettinad (Spicy & Aromatic Egg Curry)
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions and curry leaves until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, and salt. Cook until oil separates.
Add Chettinad masala and mix well.
Add boiled eggs, gently mix, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or chapati.

title: Egg Kuzhambu (Traditional Tamil Egg Curry with Tamarind)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan, splutter mustard and fenugreek seeds.
Add onions and curry leaves, sauté until soft.
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy.
Add turmeric, sambar powder, and salt. Mix well.
Add tamarind extract and bring to a boil.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

title: Egg Masala (Simple South Indian Egg Curry)
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until raw smell is gone.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, and salt. Cook till soft.
Add a little water to make a thick gravy.
Add boiled eggs, simmer for 5–7 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot.

title: Egg Curry with Coconut Milk
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions and curry leaves until soft.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for a minute.
Add tomatoes, chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, and salt. Cook till soft.
Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or appam.

title: Egg Pulao Curry (Egg Curry to accompany Pulao)
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions until translucent.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté till raw smell leaves.
Add tomatoes and cook till soft.
Add turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well.
Add water to make a medium-thick curry.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for 5–7 minutes.
Garnish and serve with pulao or biryani.

title: Egg Korma (South-Indian style with coconut paste)
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomatoes and cook till soft.
Add turmeric, coriander powder, and salt. Mix well.
Add coconut paste and cook for 5 minutes.
Add boiled eggs and garam masala, simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve.

title: Egg Thokku (Onion-Tomato Thick Gravy)
instructions: Heat oil and add curry leaves, sauté onions until soft.
Add ginger-garlic paste, cook for a minute.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, and salt. Cook until thick.
Add boiled eggs and garam masala, mix gently.
Simmer for 5 minutes and serve hot.

title: Egg Varuval (Dry Fry with Onion, Tomatoes, and Spices)
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions, curry leaves until soft.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook till fragrant.
Add tomatoes, chili powder, turmeric, and salt. Cook until thick.
Slice the boiled eggs and add to the masala.
Sprinkle garam masala, sauté gently until dry.
Serve hot as a side.

title: Muttai Kolambu (Spicy Egg Gravy)
instructions: Heat oil and splutter curry leaves.
Sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste till golden.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, and salt. Cook till mushy.
Add tamarind extract if using and boil.
Add boiled eggs and garam masala, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or idli.

title: Egg and Potato Curry
instructions: Boil eggs and potatoes. Set aside.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
Add tomatoes and ginger-garlic paste. Cook till soft.
Add turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, salt, and garam masala.
Add boiled potatoes and a little water. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Add boiled eggs and cook for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot.

title: Egg Pepper Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and curry leaves.
Add onions and sauté until soft.
Add green chili, turmeric, and pepper powder. Stir well.
Add boiled egg halves. Toss gently to coat with masala.
Cook for 3-4 minutes on low heat.
Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Egg & Onion Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until raw smell disappears.
Add tomato, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and salt.
Cook till the oil separates.
Add sliced eggs and gently mix with the masala.
Simmer for 3 minutes. Garnish with coriander leaves.

title: Muttai Kuzhambu (Tamarind Egg Curry)
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and red chilies.
Add onions and sauté till golden. Add tomatoes and cook till soft.
Add tamarind pulp, turmeric, sambar powder, and salt.
Add 1 cup of water and bring to boil.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

title: Chettinad Muttai Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add fennel seeds and curry leaves.
Sauté onion till golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook well.
Add tomato, turmeric, Chettinad masala, and salt. Cook till oil separates.
Add a little water to form gravy.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or chapati.

title: Egg Malabar Curry
instructions: Heat oil and add curry leaves and onions. Sauté till soft.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for a minute.
Add tomato, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and salt.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer.
Add eggs and cook for 5 minutes.
Serve with appam or rice.

title: Nadan Muttai Curry
instructions: Grind grated coconut with water to a smooth paste.
Heat coconut oil and add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Add onions and sauté till golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and tomato.
Add spices and salt, cook till oil separates.
Add coconut paste and a little water to make gravy.
Add eggs and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or puttu.

title: Hyderabadi Egg Curry
instructions: Grind fried onions with coconut to a smooth paste.
Heat oil, add ginger-garlic paste and sauté.
Add tomato and cook till soft.
Add turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and salt.
Add onion-coconut paste and a little water.
Add eggs and cook for 5–7 minutes.
Serve with paratha or rice.

title: Muttai Pulao
instructions: Rinse and soak rice for 20 minutes.
Heat oil and sauté onions. Add ginger-garlic paste and tomato.
Add spices and cook till oil separates.
Add soaked rice, water, and salt. Cook covered.
Slice boiled eggs and layer on top before serving.

title: Egg Stew
instructions: Heat coconut oil. Sauté onion, green chili, and curry leaves.
Add thin coconut milk and bring to a gentle boil.
Add eggs, pepper, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add thick coconut milk, simmer for 2 minutes without boiling.
Serve warm with appam or idiyappam.

title: Egg Moilee
instructions: Heat coconut oil in a pan and splutter mustard seeds.
Add sliced onions, green chilies, ginger, and curry leaves. Sauté until translucent.
Add turmeric and pepper powder. Mix well.
Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Add boiled eggs and cook for another 3-4 minutes on low heat.
Serve hot with appam or rice.

title: Egg & Mushroom Curry
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until raw smell fades.
Add turmeric, coriander powder, and tomato puree. Cook until oil separates.
Add mushrooms and cook for 5-6 minutes until soft.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve.

title: Muttai Gassi
instructions: Dry roast coconut, coriander seeds, cumin, and red chilies. Grind to a paste.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Add onions and sauté until golden. Add tomatoes and turmeric.
Add the ground masala and cook until oil separates.
Add water to make gravy and bring to a boil.
Add eggs and simmer for 5-7 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or neer dosa.

title: Kalyana Muttai Curry
instructions: Grind coconut, poppy seeds, and fennel to a smooth paste.
Heat oil, sauté onions till golden, add ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, and ground paste.
Add water to make gravy and let it simmer.
Add boiled eggs and cook for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or chapati.

title: Egg in Chettinad Masala
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté until raw smell is gone.
Add tomato, turmeric, pepper, and Chettinad masala. Cook till oil separates.
Add eggs and coat well with the masala.
Simmer for 5 minutes and garnish with coriander.
Serve with rice or paratha.

title: Egg & Spinach Curry
instructions: Blanch spinach and blend into a smooth puree.
Heat oil, add cumin seeds, and sauté onions.
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes. Cook till soft.
Add turmeric, coriander powder, and spinach puree.
Add eggs and simmer for 5-6 minutes.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

title: Muttai Curry with Potato & Beans
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add turmeric, chili powder, garam masala.
Add potatoes and beans. Cook until tender.
Add eggs and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or chapati.

title: Egg & Cauliflower Curry
instructions: Blanch cauliflower and set aside.
Heat oil, add cumin seeds, and sauté onions.
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomato puree. Cook well.
Add turmeric, coriander powder, and cook till oil separates.
Add cauliflower and eggs. Simmer for 7-8 minutes.
Serve with rice or roti.

title: Egg & Chana Curry
instructions: Heat oil, add cumin seeds, and sauté onions.
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomato. Cook till soft.
Add turmeric, chili powder, and mix well.
Add chickpeas and cook for 5 minutes.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or chapati.

title: Egg & Tomato Curry
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until raw smell disappears.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until mushy.
Add turmeric, chili powder, and garam masala.
Add eggs and simmer for 5-7 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or chapati.

title: Egg & Brinjal Curry
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions until translucent.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook till raw smell goes.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, and chili powder. Cook till tomatoes soften.
Add brinjal cubes and cook until tender.
Add boiled eggs and garam masala. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or chapati.

title: Egg & Gourd Curry
ingredients: 1 cup bottle gourd or ridge gourd (chopped)
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook till fragrant.
Add tomato, turmeric, and coriander powder. Cook till oil separates.
Add chopped gourd and cook until soft.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for 5-7 minutes.
Serve with rice or roti.

title: Egg & Mixed Vegetable Curry
instructions: Boil or steam mixed vegetables until soft.
Heat oil and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook till raw smell disappears.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, and chili powder. Cook till oil separates.
Add mixed vegetables and eggs. Mix well.
Add garam masala and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or chapati.

title: Egg & Drumstick Curry
instructions: Boil drumsticks until tender and set aside.
Heat oil, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, and sambar powder. Cook till oil separates.
Add drumsticks and a little water. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Add eggs and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

title: Egg & Mushroom Gravy
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomato puree and cook till oil separates.
Add turmeric, chili powder, and mushrooms. Cook until mushrooms soften.
Add boiled eggs and garam masala. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or paratha.

title: Egg Dry Masala
instructions: Heat oil, add cumin seeds and sauté onions until brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, then tomatoes. Cook till mushy.
Add turmeric, chili powder, and garam masala. Cook till oil separates.
Add eggs and toss well to coat with masala.
Cook until the masala turns dry. Serve hot.

title: Egg & Chana Masala
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, and chana masala. Cook till oil separates.
Add chickpeas and eggs. Mix well and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Egg Pepper Curry
instructions: Heat oil, add fennel seeds and curry leaves.
Add onions and sauté until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook till raw smell disappears.
Add turmeric and crushed pepper. Mix well.
Add eggs and toss to coat with pepper masala.
Serve hot with rice or chapati.

title: Spicy Egg Fry
instructions: Mix all spices and salt. Coat eggs with the mixture.
Dust with rice flour for crispiness (optional).
Shallow or deep fry the eggs until crispy.
Serve as a side or starter.

title: Egg & Onion Fry
instructions: Heat oil and splutter mustard seeds, add curry leaves.
Add onions and sauté until browned.
Add turmeric, chili powder, pepper, and salt.
Add sliced eggs and fry for 3-4 minutes.
Serve hot with rasam rice or chapati.

title: Egg & Green Chili Curry
instructions: Heat oil, add cumin seeds and green chilies, sauté for 1 minute.
Add onions, sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger and garlic paste, cook till raw smell disappears.
Add turmeric and salt, stir well.
Add eggs and gently coat in the masala.
Cook for 3–5 minutes and serve hot with chapati or rice.

title: Chettinad Egg Dry Fry
instructions: Heat oil and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until fragrant.
Add turmeric and Chettinad masala. Stir well.
Add boiled eggs and coat evenly in masala.
Cook until masala turns dry and sticks to eggs.
Garnish with curry leaves and serve hot.

title: Tandoori Egg Curry
instructions: Marinate boiled eggs in yogurt and tandoori masala for 15 mins.
Bake or pan-fry marinated eggs until lightly browned.
In another pan, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomato puree and cook till oil separates.
Add baked eggs and simmer for 5 mins.
Serve with naan or rice.

title: Egg Korma Fry
instructions: Grind coconut and poppy seeds into a smooth paste.
Heat oil and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, and the ground paste.
Cook till oil separates. Add eggs and mix well.
Fry till masala coats the eggs. Serve with paratha or rice.

title: Sambar with Boiled Eggs
instructions: Cook dal with turmeric until soft and mash well.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Sauté onions and tomatoes, then add sambar powder.
Add tamarind extract and cooked dal. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add boiled eggs and cook for 5 more minutes.
Serve with rice or idli.

title: Egg Rasa
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard and cumin seeds.
Add onions and sauté until soft, then add ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, and rasam powder.
Add tamarind extract and water to make a thin gravy.
Add eggs and simmer for 5–7 minutes.
Serve with rice.

title: Egg & Tamarind Gravy
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, and chili powder. Cook till soft.
Add tamarind paste and water to make gravy.
Add boiled eggs and simmer for 7–10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

title: Egg Pakora Curry
instructions: Coat egg slices in a batter made from besan, turmeric, chili, and salt.
Deep fry until golden and crispy.
In a pan, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomatoes and cook till mushy.
Add fried egg pakoras, simmer for 5 mins in water-based gravy.
Serve hot with roti or rice.

title: Egg & Sweet Potato Curry
instructions: Boil sweet potatoes until soft.
Sauté onions in oil until golden, add tomatoes and spices.
Add sweet potatoes and eggs. Stir gently.
Simmer for 5–7 minutes and serve with rice.

title: Muttai Sambhar
instructions: Cook dal with turmeric and mash well.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Add tomatoes, sambar powder, and tamarind extract.
Add cooked dal and vegetables, simmer for 10 mins.
Add eggs and simmer 5 more mins. Serve with rice or idli.

title: Egg Saagwala
instructions: Sauté onions in oil until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook till fragrant.
Add tomatoes, turmeric, and cook till soft.
Add mustard green puree and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add eggs and garam masala. Simmer for 5–7 minutes.
Serve with roti or rice.
